casebody.data:
In the Matter of Daniel JEFFERY, Claimant,
v.
FRONTIER CELLULAR VERIZON WIRELESS et al., Respondents. Hinman, Howard & Kattell, LLP, Appellant. Motion No: 2017-1100 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided on January 16, 2018

Workers' Compensation Board, Respondent.

Motion for leave to appeal denied.
